reviews.review: Mizahıyla, hikayesiyle ve bulmacalarıyla bitmesini hiç istemediğim bir oyun oldu Portal. Keşke devamı gelse de Half Life evreni ile olan bağlantısını görebilsem. Kesinlikle tavsiye ediyorum.

one of the funniest games ever with perfect voice acting and challenging puzzles, portal 2 kept surprising me until the end. also includes like 8 hours of co-op content which is a blast. 5/5 perfect game

using ur wisdom to solve the problem

Für den Preis von 8.19 Euro ist es wirklich preiswert und wirklich zu empfehlen.
Es bietet eine sehr schöne Story und gute Spielelemente. Die Rätsel sind sehr gut gestaltet und auch teilweise ziemlich knifflig.
Es bietet auch einen Multiplayer der auch viel Kooperation von dir und deinem Partner fordert.
Man kann auch eigene Rätsel erstellen und die anderer spielen.
Es gibt auch viele, gute Community-Made Mods.
Overall eine 10/10
It is the first game that maid me want to play more

Every time I replay this game, I have an amazing time. It never gets old in my opinion. The puzzles are always fun, and the dialogue is hilarious! Even after beating the game several times, I smile and laugh with every snide comment and joke that GLaDOS, Wheatley, and Cave Johnson make. This game is truly a masterpiece.

Portal 2 is an amazing game full of fun puzzles that make you think outside the box with its creative solutions. Portal 2 has lots of interesting  Easter Eggs that further thicken Portal's vast lore. The addition of the lower sector of Apature Science where the first tests and trials of the portal was an amazing addition as it allowed us to see the development of the beloved company and it allowed us to see how our favourite pshycotic murderous AI was created and treated. Overall this game is amazing and even better if you have played the first Portal and the half life series as the lore intertwines

A really great game. It is challenging and I like that it tries not to be repetitive with chapters. It gives you the freedom and creativity to solve and does not spoon-feed you on how it is supposed to be done. At first I had some problems with motion sickness so I tried to lower the mouse sensitivity - but the best solution really is to play this with a controller. It's a real fun game and I enjoyed playing it in 2022.
